00032 #ifndef __LWIP_NETIF_H__
00033 #define __LWIP_NETIF_H__
00034 
00035 #include "lwip/opt.h"
00036 
00037 #include "lwip/err.h"
00038 
00039 #include "lwip/ip_addr.h"
00040 
00041 #include "lwip/inet.h"
00042 #include "lwip/pbuf.h"
00043 #include "lwip/dhcp.h"
00044 
00047 #define NETIF_MAX_HWADDR_LEN 6U
00048 
00054 #define NETIF_FLAG_UP 0x1U
00055 
00056 #define NETIF_FLAG_BROADCAST 0x2U
00057 
00058 #define NETIF_FLAG_POINTTOPOINT 0x4U
00059 
00060 #define NETIF_FLAG_DHCP 0x08U
00061 
00063 #define NETIF_FLAG_LINK_UP 0x10U
00064 
00066 struct netif {
00068   struct netif *next;
00073   struct ip_addr ip_addr;
00074   struct ip_addr netmask;
00075   struct ip_addr gw;
00076 
00079   err_t (* input)(struct pbuf *p, struct netif *inp);
00083   err_t (* output)(struct netif *netif, struct pbuf *p,
00084        struct ip_addr *ipaddr);
00088   err_t (* linkoutput)(struct netif *netif, struct pbuf *p);
00091   void *state;
00092 #if LWIP_DHCP
00093 
00094   struct dhcp *dhcp;
00095 #endif
00096 
00097   unsigned char hwaddr_len;
00099   unsigned char hwaddr[NETIF_MAX_HWADDR_LEN];
00101   u16_t mtu;
00103   char name[2];
00105   u8_t num;
00107   u8_t flags;
00108 };
00109 
00111 extern struct netif *netif_list;
00113 extern struct netif *netif_default;
00114 
00115 /* netif_init() must be called first. */
00116 void netif_init(void);
00117 
00118 struct netif *netif_add(struct ip_addr *ipaddr, struct ip_addr *netmask,
00119       struct ip_addr *gw,
00120       void *state,
00121       err_t (* init)(struct netif *netif),
00122       err_t (* input)(struct pbuf *p, struct netif *netif));
00123 
00124 void
00125 netif_set_addr(struct netif *netif,struct ip_addr *ipaddr, struct ip_addr *netmask,
00126     struct ip_addr *gw);
00127 void netif_remove(struct netif * netif);
00128 
00129 /* Returns a network interface given its name. The name is of the form
00130    "et0", where the first two letters are the "name" field in the
00131    netif structure, and the digit is in the num field in the same
00132    structure. */
00133 struct netif *netif_find(char *name);
00134 
00135 void netif_set_default(struct netif *netif);
00136 
00137 void netif_set_ipaddr(struct netif *netif, struct ip_addr *ipaddr);
00138 void netif_set_netmask(struct netif *netif, struct ip_addr *netmast);
00139 void netif_set_gw(struct netif *netif, struct ip_addr *gw);
00140 
00141 #endif /* __LWIP_NETIF_H__ */
